forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
